original: Niyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: niyyānikam dhammam paṭicca na niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Aniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca na niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: niyyānikam ca aniyyānikam ca dhammam paṭicca na niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca
